page.title: 11A Day in the Life of? 4
page.content: 4.00p.m.I went roller skating up and down our road.Then I played catch with my dad,but I kept dropping the ball. 4.30p.m.Mum shouted us that tea was ready.We had chicken steaks with salad and bread and butter and a drink of water. 5.00p.m.I packed my bags for when I had to go to my grandads to sleep. 5.30p.m.We got ready to watch my dad in a Fun-Run at Newton-on-Rawcliffe. 6.00p.m.We set off in the car 6.30p.m.We played I-spy in the car as we went to Newton.All the run ners set off at 7.00p.m. 7.30p.m.My dad came fifth.Some of the runners had come back.We set off for home.8.00p.m.I got washed and ready for bed.I went to bed and read for a while before I went to sleep.
